articles.author: Gerrard Kaonga
articles.title: Queen's Elizabeth II's secret message to USA in first speech during WW2 exposed - Express
articles.description: QUEEN ELIZABETH II's integral role in getting the US to join WW2 has been exposed in a documentary dissecting the Queen's secret message in her first speech.

articles.content:

articles.title: Keith Lemon reveals the gigs he refuses to do because fans grope and say 'sexual things' to him - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: The comedian Leigh Francis says fans are confusing him for his alter-ago
articles.content:
Comedian Leigh Francis has claimed he's had to turn down gigs because fans grope and say 'sexual things' to him.
Leigh says fans act this way towards him because they're confusing him for his crude TV character Keith Lemon when they see him in public.

articles.title: Andy Serkis raises nearly £300,000 in 12-hour ‘Hobbit’ readathon - NME
articles.description: Gollum actor Andy Serkis has raised nearly £300,000 for charity with his readathon for 'The Hobbit', which saw him read the entire book in one sitting.
articles.content:
Andy Serkis has raised £280,000 with his The Hobbit readathon this week.
The actor, who plays Gollum in the classic film series, read the whole J.R.R. Tolkein book in one sitting on Friday (May 8).
